name: Satan's Slime
description:
Satan's Slime is a small game where you play as the Dark Lord's pet slime. In this game you are assigned the task of making the deadliest dungeon in the world! To do this, you need to defeat as many Heroes as you can! But you can't do it alone. So, enlist the help of a variety of different monsters and equip your dungeon with traps. When you purchase a monster, your slime will get the ability to shape-shift into those monsters and use their moves.

This game includes:

- 11 Monsters to help defeat the Heroes!

- 11 Traps to spice up your dungeon!

- A dynamic soundtrack that changes depending on the monsters and traps in your dungeon!

- A brief manual that details the story and gameplay mechanics!
